languages.text: "Один исход паршивее другого — такой у меня выбор?"
"One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"
languages.original_text: "Один исход паршивее другого — такой у меня выбор?"

traits.locale_text: "One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"
"One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"
"One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"
"One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"
"One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"

languages.text: 「ひとつの結末はもうひとつの結末よりひどいよな…それが俺に与えられた選択肢ってわけか？」
languages.original_text: "One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"

traits.locale_text: 「ひとつの結末はもうひとつの結末よりひどいよな…それが俺に与えられた選択肢ってわけか？」

languages.text: "Ein Ergebnis ist schlimmer als das andere – sind das meine Optionen?"
languages.original_text: "One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Ergebnis ist schlimmer als das andere – sind das meine Optionen?"

languages.text: « Une option est pire que l'autre. Ce sont mes seuls choix ? »
languages.original_text: "One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"

traits.locale_text: « Une option est pire que l'autre. Ce sont mes seuls choix ? »

languages.text: «Un resultado es peor que el otro; ¿son esas mis únicas opciones?».
languages.original_text: "One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"

traits.locale_text: «Un resultado es peor que el otro; ¿son esas mis únicas opciones?».

languages.text: “糟糕的结果和更糟糕的结果，我只有这两个选择，是吗？”
languages.original_text: "One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"

traits.locale_text: “糟糕的结果和更糟糕的结果，我只有这两个选择，是吗？”

languages.text: "Her bir sonuç, diğerinden beter. Seçeneklerim bunlar mı?"
languages.original_text: "One outcome is worse than the other — are those my options?"

traits.locale_text: "Her bir sonuç diğerinden beter. Seçeneklerim bunlar mı?"
